a: We are open Mon–Fri 08:00–18:00, Sat 09:00–14:00. Closed Sunday.
Yes. We require 48 hours notice and a 30% deposit. Prices start at 450 NOK.
We deliver within 10 km of Sarpsborg center. 59 NOK under 500 NOK orders; free over 500 NOK.
Yes, we offer gluten-free bread and cupcakes daily. For custom GF cakes, please order 48 hours ahead.

q: How do I place an order?
a: Order online, by phone at 69 11 22 33, or visit us at St. Marie gate 42, 1706 Sarpsborg.
